history.proof: intros. unfold "<==", sup. qsimpl use: LatticeMixin. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment T : lattice s : Pred T x : T H : x \\In s Unable to unify "mixin_of ?M1464" with "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class T) in mx_leq) x (mx_sup (mixin (class T)) s)".
The reference x0 was not found in the current environment.

In environment X : forall (T : Poset.Exports.poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \\In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \\In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> mixin_of T T : lattice s : Pred T x : T H : x \\In s Unable to unify "let (sub_sort, val, Sub, _, _) := ?sT in sub_sort" with "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (class T) in mx_leq) x (mx_sup (mixin (class T)) s)".
The reference Hy was not found in the current environment.

original: intros T s x H. unfold "<==", sup. apply LatticeMixin. intros x0 Hx0. apply H with (x0:=x0). apply Sub. intros y Hy. left. apply Hy.
